title: The Streaming Wars Gain a New Villain
itunes:title: The Streaming Wars Gain a New Villain
description:
This week, Pierre Debbas, managing partner at Romer Debbas, joined to talk about the 2020 election's impact on the real estate market. Michelle Girard, chief U.S. economist at Natwest Markets, broke down Fed Chair Powell's testimony to Congress. Michael Morris, senior managing director at Guggenheim Securities, discussed the highly anticipated (and slightly glitch-filled) rollout of Disney+. Then Scarlet sat down with Kendall Coyne Schofield, captain of the U.S. Women's National Hockey Team and an Olympic Gold Medalist, to talk about her fight for a professional women's ice hockey league that pays a living wage.

See omnystudio.com/listener for privacy information.
content:encoded:

Michelle Girard, chief U.S. economist at Natwest Markets, broke down Fed Chair Powell's testimony to Congress. Michael Morris, senior managing director at Guggenheim Securities, discussed the highly anticipated (and slightly glitch-filled) rollout of Disney+. Then Scarlet sat down with Kendall Coyne Schofield, captain of the U.S. Women's National Hockey Team and an Olympic Gold Medalist, to talk about her fight for a professional women's ice hockey league that pays a living wage.

itunes:author: Bloomberg
